definitions: Fail to hit, reach, or catch (an object or target).
Fail to notice, perceive, or understand.
Be too late for (something, such as a bus or train).
Feel the absence of or longing for.
examples: She tried to hit the ball but missed.
I missed the subtle humor in his remark.
He missed his flight to London.
You can't miss seeing that huge monument.
I really miss my family when I travel.
